alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 3:56PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Box Butte, Dawes, central Sioux, southeastern Niobrara and northeastern Goshen Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 256 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles north of Whitney Lake to near Fort Robinson Campground to 9 miles north of Agate Bed National Monument to 12 miles east of Prairie Center. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chadron, Crawford, Harrison, Whitney Lake, Red Cloud Campground, Agate Bed National Monument, Fort Robinson Campground, Chadron Campground, Flahertys Corner, Chadron Airport, Whitney, Marsland and Fort Robinson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Cheyenne.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux
